Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.weapons

Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weapons.Target
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlayerTarget, SquareTarget
    public class Target
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Target, which contains all the pieces of information needed to define a class of hittable squares or players

      • isRoom

        public boolean isRoom()
        Returns:
        Whether this target hits also all the other targets in the same room of the selected one

      • fixReverse

        public boolean fixReverse()
        Returns:
        Whether this target fixes the farthest target selected

      • isChain

        public boolean isChain()
        Returns:
        Whether this target is a chain one, it means that the visibility and distance are calculated based on the position of the last damaged player

      • validateTargetSquare

        public boolean validateTargetSquare​(Player attacker,
                                    Square destSquare)
        This method checks whether the target square can be a valid one
        Parameters:
        attacker - The player firing with the weapon
        destSquare - The target chose for the attack
        Returns:
        Whether the target can be hit by the attacker with this specific weapon attack

      • compatibleTargetSquares

        public boolean compatibleTargetSquares​(Player attacker,
                                       java.util.List<Square> targets)
        This method checks whether a list of target squares can be targeted as a group
        Parameters:
        attacker - The player firing with the weapon
        targets - A list containing some squares chose as targets
        Returns:
        Whether the targets, as a group, can be selected for the attack
